name: Loppy: Planet Hopper
storyline:
The game takes place in a far-off solar system, named the "Polarian Solar System", inhabited by unique-looking aliens, who live in various themed planets (city planet, beach planet, prehistoric planet, etc).

The story revolves around a group of aliens, named Loppy, Evlie, Myah, and Studart, all of which work at a small bakery in "Polaris" (city planet), happily named the "GoGo Bakery".

One day, out of the blue, their workplace is threatened when Rang Tang, an evil corporation bent on taking over various independent businesses (and the entire universe), sends them a letter obliging them to fork over the bakery.

Not wanting to give up their love for baking, the aliens decide to fight their way to Rang Tang's headquarters, even if it'll cost them a life to do so.
summary: Join Loppy, and her friends, on an out-of-this-world 2D platforming adventure where you'll travel to various themed planets, run through levels, jump over obstacles, stomp and punch evil businessmen, find ingredients, discover secrets, and save the galaxy (including your own bakery), from the clutches of an evil corporation.
